data.author: Eva Roytburg
data.title: Stock futures slide while gold and silver jump after Powell investigation raises fears over the Fed’s independence
data.description: Powell said the investigation rests on “pretexts,” arguing it's retaliation for the Fed’s refusal to follow the Trump's preferences on interest rates.

data.author: Jason Ma
data.title: DOJ probe on Powell draws swift backlash from Congress as key GOP senator says he won’t confirm anyone for the Fed until case is resolved
data.description: "If there were any remaining doubt whether advisers within the Trump Administration are actively pushing to end the independence of the Federal Reserve, there should now be none."
data.content: Lawmakers sounded the alarm on the Justice Departments criminal inquiry into Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell, putting at risk President Donald Trumps efforts to name a new central bank leader.… [+2048 chars]

data.author: Jason Ma
data.title: Powell blasts DOJ criminal probe as attack on Fed independence. ‘Public service sometimes requires standing firm in the face of threats’
data.description: He said in a statement Sunday that the Justice Department of served the Fed with grand jury subpoenas, threatening a criminal indictment.
